name: Vredefort
description:
A game created in 9 days for the 2 Buttons Jam

This game uses only two buttons (Z and X)! We had a ton of fun creating this crumbling world for you to skate through. Enjoy challenging platforming and beautiful vistas.

Controls

Z and X represent your back and front legs respectively.
Press both Z and X to crouch down.
Release X then Z quickly to do a small jump.
Release X, wait, then release Z to do a large jump.
Press Z and X together close to the ground to land.

Created By

Beenut Games!

Cameron AlsbrookDerya Yilmaz AlsbrookProgramming, Game Design, MusicArt, Animations
